Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 97-22 Filed 12/14/20 Page 12 of 30
William JULIÉ
avocat à la cour - attorney at law
30. The requested person has to be handed over by the agents of the requested State within one month after the extradition decree has been notified to the requesting State14.
14 Article 15.4 of the Extradition Treaty between the USA and France of 23 April 1996.
51, rue Ampère - 75017 paris - tél. 01 88 33 51 80 - fax. 01 88 33 51 81 www.wjavocats.com - palais C1652 wj@wjavocats.com - 11 DOJ-OGR-00002136
